"Preset Abilities":
"On rare occasion, weapons and armor dropped from enemies will have a Special Ability with a special effect, called a Preset Ability.

You can use the \"Add Preset Abilities\" function at the Item Lab to add a Preset Ability to an item, or replace one that it already has.

“プリセット能力”はレベル1～5まで存在し、
レベルが高いものほど、入手しづらくなります。"
"To add a Preset Ability to an item, you need one item of the same name which already has the Preset Ability you want, which will be used as material, as well as N-Meseta."
